channel.title: Pages on Rui Li
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Rui Li

item.title: About
item.description: Digitalisation Engineer at Fraunhofer Gesellschaft. Experienced programmers with an academic publication and two patents. A Team player and ready for a new opportunity. Work experiences Fraunhofer Gesellschaft Research Associate 2021.4-Present 1- Realization of digital tracking of the whole production process of sand core The setting of Distributed Servers Based on Single Chip Computers Centralized management of servers using Kubernetes cluster technology Development of sensor mats for sensing sand cores Construction of Web Visualization Platform 2- Exploring the feature correlation matrix of de-core process
